Welcome

This is the personal website of Sven Franke, showcasing research, projects, and academic work.

About Me

I am a research associate and PhD student specializing in material handling, warehousing, and mobile robotics.

Education

  • Master of Science (M.Sc.) - Industrial Engineering, TU Dortmund University , 2020-2021
  • Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) - Industrial Engineering, TU Dortmund University , 2014-2020

Professional Experience

Research Associate - Chair of Material Handling and Warehousing, TU Dortmund University
April 2022 - Present

  • Research in material handling systems and warehouse automation
  • Mobile robotics and AGV standardization (M2X)
  • Web

Student Assistant - Fraunhofer Institute for Material Flow and Logistics IML, Department of Intralogistics and IT Planning
December 2019 - March 2022

  • Supported research projects in intralogistics planning

Intern - HELLA (now FORVIA HELLA), SMD Production
September 2019 - November 2019

  • Gained experience in surface-mount device manufacturing

Student Assistant - Fraunhofer Institute for Material Flow and Logistics IML, Department of Intralogistics and IT Planning
March 2018 - August 2019

  • Early research experience in warehouse and logistics systems

Intern SCHWING-Stetter March 2016 - April 2016

  • Internship in assembly/disassembly, production of electrical components and construction/assembly/maintenance of electronic systems

Intern Bochumer Eisenhütte GmbH & Co KG September 2015 - October 2015

  • Internship in maintenance and workshop (manual-machine production processes)

Awards & Recognition

  • Best Speaker Award (2nd Place) - Mobile Robotics Summit 2025
    For presentation on “M2X Further standardization in the field of AGVs alongside VDA 5050”

  • Deutschlandstipendium (German Scholarship) - TU Dortmund University, 2020/2021
    Funded by LANXESS AG

Datasets

  • Sven Franke, Dennis Lünsch, & Constantin Enke. (2025). M2X-Project/m2x: M2X v0.2.1 (v0.2.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15805443

  • Franke, S. (2024). Test Results: Can ChatGPT Solve Undergraduate Exams from Logistics Studies? An Investigation. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14412298

  • Franke, S., Bommert, A., Brandt, M. J., Kuhlmann, J. L., Olivier, M.-C., Schorning, K., Roidl, M., Reining, C., & Kirchheim, A. (2024). Sensor-based Pallet Activity Recognition in Logistics (SPARL Version 2) - A multi-modal Dataset (Version 2) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13318882

  • Franke, S., Bommert, A., Brandt, M. J., Kuhlmann, J. L., Olivier, M.-C., Schorning, K., Roidl, M., Reining, C., & Kirchheim, A. (2024). Sensor-based Pallet Activity Recognition in Logistics (SPARL Version 1) - A multi-modal Dataset (Version 1) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.11280959

  • Jérôme Rutinowski, Sven Franke, & Jan Endendyk. (2023). ChatGPT chats for “The Self-Perception and Political Biases of ChatGPT”. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7849138

  • Jérôme Rutinowski, Hazem Youssef, Sven Franke, Irfan Fachrudin Priyanta, Frederik Polachowski, Moritz Roidl, & Christopher Reining. (2023). TOMIE (Tracking Of Multiple Industrial Entities) Dataset [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7849183
